answers.answer: Hi, It sounds that you have nerve compression in foot, neuropathy (alcohol or diabetes) or any circulatory disturbances. I would recommend that you first thoroughly evaluate all the possibilities with help of a neurologist first. Treatment depends upon treating the main cause. Hope this helps.

question: can anything be done about my foot numbness at night.  I can'tsleep with it.This discussion is related to/posts/show/894492.
title: numbness of feet at night
